subject: Football
College Athletics
organizations: Rutgers, The State University of New Jersey
lead_paragraph: With all due respect to what Greg Schiano has built at Rutgers, shouldn’t the ambitions of the program be modified to meet the harsh realities all around it?
snippet: With all due respect to what Greg Schiano has built at Rutgers, shouldn’t the ambitions of the program be modified to meet the harsh realities all around it?
